content: between squares continue to next square ch4 treble_crochet in the ch3 loop of the next pc2 pc3 ch4 skip 2 pc3 s behind the hook slip_stitch into next ch8 space ch4 double_crochet in the 1st pair of vertical bars on the last treble_crochet pc3 15 times 17 finish last square ch4 dtr in next dtr mark dtr do not break yarn border 18 round 1 ch5 slip_stitch into next ch8 space twice mark last slip_stitch should be at the corner 19 next edge * ch5 slip_stitch into next ch8 space twice ch5 skip next pc3 and 4 chain slip_stitch into next slip_stitch repeat from * to next corner working a slip_stitch in the corner ch8 and marking the slip_stitch 20 repeat step 19 to end of round end with a slip_stitch in the marked dtr remove marker 21 round 2 ch4 counts as treble_crochet and 1 chain treble_crochet ch1 twice in next ch5 space treble_crochet in next slip_stitch ch1 treble_crochet twice in the next ch5 space ch1 22 corner in marked st work treble_crochet ch1 dtr ch1 double_crochet in the 2nd pair of vertical bars of the last dtr move marker to last ch1 space ch1 treble_crochet 23 next edge * ch1 treble_crochet twice in the next ch5 space ch1 treble_crochet in next slip_stitch repeat from * along edge ending with ch1 before marked corner st 24 corner in marked st work treble_crochet ch1 dtr ch1 double_crochet in the 2nd pair of vertical bars of the last dtr move marker to last ch1 space ch1 treble_crochet 25 repeat step 23 step 24 to end of round ending with slip_stitch into the 3rd chain of the beginning ch4 26 first picot round ch1 pc4 in same st place marker in the first single_crochet of the pc4 ch7 27 *skip 3 ch1 spaces pc4 in next treble_crochet ch7 repeat from * to last pc4 on this edge which should be sitting 1 space before the corner ch7 28 corner in marked space work single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch7 single_crochet move marker to last ch7 space ch3 single_crochet ch7 29 continue to next side skip next ch1 space pc4 in next treble_crochet ch7 6 30 repeat step 27 - 29 for the rest of the round but substitute last ch7 of the round with ch3 dtr in marked single_crochet 31 2nd picot round ch1 pc4 in same st mark first single_crochet of the pc4 ch7 32 *pc4 in the 4th chain of the next ch7 space ch7 repeat from * ending with ch7 before next marked corner space 33 corner in 4th chain of the marked space work single_crochet ch3 single_crochet ch7 single_crochet move marker to last ch7 space ch3 single_crochet ch7 34 repeat step 32 - step 33 for the rest of the round but substitute last ch7 of the round with ch3 dtr in marked st 35 3rd picot round as for 2nd picot round steps 31 - 34 mark last dtr 36 last round ch5 slip_stitch in each ch7 space all
